PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12902023-12-15NRCAN
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisDesignation of TIMOTHY BERUBE of Thunder Bay, Ontario, to act as President of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on March 29, 2024, or until such time as a new President is designated, whichever occurs first.
AttachmentsAttachment
